dialog: Only you can decide what's best for you, Jesse.
So, what are you gonna do with all that money?
Same thing I do with all the other money.
Not sure I should stick around town.
Like, if you were my age.
Yeah, if I were your age, starting fresh, Alaska.
Up there, you could be anything you want.
Sorry, kid, that's the one thing you can never do.
This thing's, like, defective and shit.
Think you got Cheeto dust in the controller.
It's a bad carpenter that blames his hammer, yo.
I'm apexing at the apex, bitch.
Don't be telling me how to drive and shit.
You couldn't drive a twobutton elevator.
You couldn't drive a short bus full of slow kids to the zoo.
Yeah, because I'd be too distracted by you.
You'd be sitting up front, in your special helmet, trying to hump my leg.
On account you couldn't drive Thelma and Louise off of that cliff. Apex!
I can't apex more than I'm already apexing.
You drive like a blind guy with no legs.
you drive like my dead grandmoms.
I gotta get that car off the street.
Come check out what's on TV.
I ain't watching no TV right now.
Is it true that a military grade firearm was altered and used to carry out this attack?
To the best of my knowledge, it was an M60 machine gun, which, yes, that's strictly a military issue weapon.
As to where he could have obtained such a weapon, or the socalled "remote control" aspect of it, anything I could say at this point would just be conjecture, and I'm not going to engage in that. Yes?
Could you tell us more about this person of interest?

We're hearing a lot of conflicting information and I'm unclear whether this person took part in the killings, or whether they were, in fact, I guess the word we keep hearing is "liberated." Were they liberated by White from some sort of captivity?
I'm not prepared, at this time, to say any more than that.
They're a person of interest and they may have information relevant to this case, or other cases the DEA's investigating.
What were the motives of his captors?
Can't speculate on that at this time...
Hey! It's cool man, it's us!
My stuff's gonna fit you like a T, yo.
Not like if you had to borrow it from Sasquatch over here.
Can't help it that I'm sized for love.
Yeah, you go love all the giraffes you want, bitch.
Me and Jesse are sticking with the ladies.
Get you some new clothes then.
Shower will make you feel a whole lot better.
Truth be told, you look like you're hurting for one.
Got you a clean towel, the one on the right. Well, kinda.
And feel free to open up a new bar of Irish Spring, whatever.
'Cause the old one might have, like, hairs on it and shit, and uh, yo, I got Axe body spray, I got Obsession for Men, I got Tommy Hilfinger.
Feel free to use any of 'em you want, you know? Use 'em all.
I got it for him for Christmas.
Maybe don't, like, shave and whatnot, you know?
Did they really keep you in a cage?
Want a little something, take the edge off?
Why'd you, uh, turn off the TV?
There's just, uh... a whole lot of it.
I gotta get out of here.
Where to? You got a plan?
Hey, uh, Skinny, you got a burner you can give me?
Fully charged and clean as a whistle.
First, I gotta get rid of that car.
...to the victims and his role in their brutal slayings remains unconfirmed by federal authorities.
However, APD sources say the suspect is Jesse Bruce Pinkman, a local man who was a student of White's before joining him in the drug trade.
Together, the two were responsible for the largest methamphetamine manufacturing operation in US history.
Sources speculate the two had a falling out, after which it is believed Pinkman was manufacturing the drug  for the group holding him captive.
Police are now on the hunt for Pinkman and urging the community to remain vigilant.
They're asking anyone with information  to contact APD or call Crimestoppers...
Yeah, I know who this is.
Look, thank you so much for doing this, Joe.
About the money, if we can maybe...
You gentlemen threw me plenty of business back in the day.
I got no complaints in that department.
That was a good one. So...
Frankly, you know, I can tell you now, I had zero confidence that that would work.
None whatsoever, but hey, live and learn.
Writing myself a little insurance policy.
All right, mind at ease, think we're good.
Fleeing, and I suggest you do the same.
LoJack. The company just activated it, just this minute.
Look, Johnny Law is on his way, as in here, as in now.
So farewell, goodbye, regrets, etcetera etcetera.
Who's got the keys to that car?
Yo. Yo! What are you doing?
We gotta get this thing outta here.
Badger, give me the keys to your Fiero.
I don't even like your car.
Badger drives my Tbird Think you'll be heading to Mexico?
Hide it, kind of, but, yo, don't hide it so good the cops can't find it.
Wipe it down for prints, then hitchhike back.
Do not let nobody see you in that car.
Ain't like the cops don't already know where it is.
I'll tell 'em you dropped by, the two of us smoked a fat bowl, traded pink slips, then you split.
I always wanted me an El Camino.
I'll pass any lie detector they give me.
Guys, I don't know what to say.
You got about three hours to get this thing down south.
I'll keep my mouth shut till then, but after that, they gonna be putting a APB out on this bitch.
That right there is a clown car.
No selfrespecting outlaw would ever get caught dead in that thing.
That's why it's perfect, yo. Deep cover.
Oh, uh, the El Camino, let me see the keys.
Just might keep you from getting spotted.
Guy on KOB keeps calling for rain.
Guy said like forty percent chance yesterday.
Maybe it was even fifty yesterday.
But so far, I mean, I... Yeah, I see clouds, but I wouldn't call 'em rain clouds, just regular...
Anyway, that's what they look like to me.
I'm not putting myself out there as any kind of expert or whatnot, but I do think it's gonna be...
Yeah. Uncle Jack took everybody down to Elephant Butte, on account of he got this new Chaparral.
It's pretty badass, but I told him...
I'm not really big into waterskiing, plus, somebody's...
it's just you and me the whole weekend.
I'd really like your help with something.
I... I hate to be all like...
But we gotta talk ground rules.
Uh, if you tried to, you know, escape, I'm gonna have to visit the little boy.
out of my hands at that point.
Uncle Jack made you that promise, and he's gonna want to stick to it.
I'ma do a better job of keeping you clean from now on, okay?

âª Take a drive along the beach âª âª Or stay at home and watch TV âª âª You see it really doesn't matter much to me âª âª I'm not talking about moving in âª âª And I don't wanna change your... âª Good job.
There used to be water in it, but they took it out a couple years ago 'cause of...
Okay, so, it's not actually that heavy, but...
try as I might, I can't ever get this thing on by myself.
What are you better at, going forwards or backwards?
Okay, well, let's both go sideways for a while.
I thought maybe I could just hang it from the ceiling here...
and just drive right under and drop it in, but my...
landlord didn't really like that idea.
I found this thing on Craigslist.
So is that what you needed help with?
The drug kingpin once known throughout the southwest as Heisenberg may yet claim a final victim.
Texas authorities investigating the poisoning of a Houston woman are looking into her possible connection to Walter White's criminal organization.
The unnamed woman, who is hospitalized in critical condition, is not expected to survive.

White, the former Albuquerque school teacher who was the subject of a sixmonth international manhunt, was found dead late Tuesday at the scene of a gang massacre which claimed the lives of nine people.
The dollar is down today on the foreign exchange markets after an extremely turbulent week for the Euro.
The Dow Jones is down 15 points, the NASDAQ is down 34 points, and the S&P 500 is up ten points.
...have been moved indefinitely after the discovery of asbestos in 70 percent of the units.
All residents have been temporarily relocated...
Hey there, look what the cat dragged in.
Nope, not that I know of.
Hey there, Lou. What you up to?
This ficus down at your end has been looking kinda puny.
Gotta keep the thrift bugs off it.
So, is a ficus technically a plant or a tree?
I'd say it all depends. Um...
Keep in mind you got over 800 species of the darned thing.
Well, all right, Lou, you have a good one.
Yeah. Don't take any wooden nickels.
He's not supposed to be home at this hour.
We really lucked out that he didn't see you.
He's just always lurking around, being nosy.
I mean, he was in Vietnam, which I totally respect, but still...
I was thinking of Easter eggs, but...
lately, I'm thinking I might like to try some new paint.
This stuff is starting to feel pretty tired.
Sure, so, you... Is that why I'm here?
You want me to help you paint?
If we have some time left over.
Okay, please don't, you know, make me feel worse than I already do.
And honestly, I don't feel much like talking about it, so...
You want to give me a hand, Jesse?
Now, we just gotta wait for nosy Lou to go bowling.
I think he leaves in like an hour.
I got chicken noodle, chicken and stars, cream of chicken.
What did she do to you?
Oh, she didn't do anything to me.
That book, if you wanna know so bad.
Uncle Jack taught me always keep my money close, so...
I have these old World Book Encyclopedias, the whole entire set.
My grammy gave 'em to me when I was in middle school, but I figured...
nobody needs books anymore, 'cause everything's on the computer.
Uh, it seemed like a good hiding place.
Plus, I had all these other volumes left to fill.
So your cleaning lady was stealing your money?
She was as honest as the day is long.
But she found it, and I can't have anybody finding it.
She brought it straight in here to show me.
She actually thought I didn't know it was there.
I just... I wonder what the heck she was looking up?
M for Mexico maybe? I don't know.
Where are we gonna... take her?
Hey, do me a favor and put that away, would ya?
Just straight down the hall all the way in the back, there's a whole shelf of 'em.
Sure you don't want any soup?
I guess I better come up with a new hiding place for my money.
They got these things called banks.
Actually, I think I know the perfect spot.
It might take a little engineering, but...
Man, it would be right here and nobody would ever find it.
"Nothing beats cash on hand," that's what Uncle Jack says.
I mean, he liked to draw.
When was the last time you saw him?
A year. Maybe more. I mean...
it was way before all of this.
Is there anything you wish you could say to your son right now?
For your sake, for everybody's sake, son, turn yourself in.

âª You're looking kinda lonely, girl âª âª Would you like someone new to talk to âª âª Ah, yeah, all right âª âª I'm feeling kinda lonely too âª âª If you don't mind âª âª Can I sit down here beside you âª âª Ah, yeah, all right âª âª If I seem to come on too strong âª âª I hope that you will understand âª âª I say these things 'cause I'd like to know âª âª If you're as lonely as I am âª âª And if you mind âª âª Sharing the night together âª âª Ooh, yeah âª âª Sharing the night together âª âª Ooh, yeah âª âª Sharing the night âª âª We could bring in the morning, girl âª âª If you want to go that far âª âª And if tomorrow finds us together âª âª Right here the way we are âª âª Would you mind âª âª Sharing the night together âª âª Ooh, yeah âª âª Sharing the night together âª âª Ooh, yeah âª You wanna say a few words?
Hey, grab another pack, would ya?
There should be one in the glove box.
On the way home, I was gonna get us some pizza.
What kind of pizza do you like, Jesse?
Should be a heck of a sunset.
You know what Uncle Jack says, "Life is what you make it." God!
Oh, hey. You folks are back, huh?
When you search a place, you really search it.
Sir, what can we do for you?
I live across the hall, down in unit 11.
I talked to your guys yesterday.
I got a card from one of your sergeants, and I just want you to know I'm around if you ever need any additional information.
See, I knew the decedent pretty well, never really trusted him.
To be honest, I kinda saw this thing coming.
I mean, well, not exactly, but kinda.
Well, we'll definitely keep that in mind.
No, I'm sorry, we're fresh out.
You too, and hey, listen, if you ever need any help with this case, see I've done a little investigating myself. I...
I'll start here, you start in the back.
Neil, they've tossed the shit out of this place. What's left to find?
Yeah, no crazy in this house.
What's waiting for me back there, Casey?
Put your gun down and show me your hands!
He says he's not looking to kill any cops.
let's figure this out, all right?
Let's... We're gonna figure this out.
What are you doing here, Pinkman?
As soon as I get it, I am gone.
You let me outta here, I swear I will not hurt this guy.
Seriously, throw your gun in here and show me your hands.
Seriously, no. You point yours at me, I point mine at you.
Look... I don't wanna shoot any cops.
Yeah, you don't wanna shoot any cops.
You know how many officers we got downstairs?
Tell him, Casey, tell him how many.
A good six, last I counted.
Six my ass, I counted eight of 'em down there.
Patrol car on all four corners, more up the street.
They hear shooting, what do you think they're gonna do?
Then how far do you think you're gonna get?
There's only one choice here, buddy.
And you know what it is.
Jesus Christ! Are you kidding me?
Hey, how about some handcuffs, yo.
Find me something to gag him with.
I know where the money is.
That's what you're here for, right?
You picked up a couple of windbreakers at the Army & Navy store, came strolling in, all clever and shit.
Well, I know where it is.
And I guaranfuckingtee you won't find it on your own.
I got somethin' that might be helpful.
Uh, sorry about that, sir. We're...
I thought your CSI boys do that.
Yeah, well, you know, sometimes, you want something done right...
Oh, God, tell me about it.
My line was restaurant and hospitality supplies, so I completely get it.
Hey, listen, I just came across an old note Todd Alquist wrote me.
Figured it may be of interest.
Sort of a halfassed apology he slipped under my door.
I'd gone to our landlord about this stupid truck cap of his everybody kept tripping over, and...
Well, anyway, if you need a handwriting sample for analysis.
That's... Yeah, yeah, that could be...
Didn't want to touch it, speaking of fingerprints.
You're welcome to come examine it.
Oh, it's no trouble. I got time.
Show me the money, I let you go.
there's gotta be a million here. Yeah.
A little man with big dreams? Yeah?
Hey, if I were you, I'd walk the hell outta here right now.
I'll shoot you, you son of a bitch.
If I don't get this money, I am dead anyway.
All right? If you pull that trigger, then you are gonna have to kill that loudmouth down the hall and every other witness in the place.
Then you will be as fucked as I am.
Threeway split. And you got your third.
You gotta keep him talking for the next five minutes.
Since I got the Brita, I find the tea tastes noticeably better.
You got balls, I'll give you that.
Can I get my gun back?
I was wondering when you were gonna remember me.
It's colorful, I'll say that much.
Uh, I don't expect you'd ever lose it in your closet.
Mm. And no dirt bag to replace?
A lot of our customers find that handy and practical.
But they want an arm and a leg to pay for it.
And I ain't paying for no paint job.
Yes, I agree. It's very expensive.
However, if you are in love with your Kirby, I'll bet I could get it working for you again.
Uh, be with you in a minute.
Fixing my Kirby, how much would that cost?
Well, I won't know until I take a good look at it, and it...
and if it needed a new motor, it'd be a little bit expensive, but certainly not as expensive as a new Dyson.
all you gotta do is bring it in here.
I may take you up on that.
If I can get my niece to help me.
Yes, they do, and I want you to promise you won't try to bring it in by yourself.
I just don't know why they can't make things to last anymore.
I want you to have a great day now.
Thank you, thanks for your help.
I'll be back with my Kirby.
If there's any questions I can answer, just let me know.
I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't do that.
Hoover, or maybe it's a Pro Max.
Got like a... like a filter.
Hoover products are right over there on the wall behind you.
Look, I don't remember the exact, like, password.
All right? But it was a vacuum thing.
Come on, man, you know why I'm here.
I can't say I do, no.
Yeah, you do. You're the guy.
Look, I am 96 percent sure that you are the guy, so why don't you just, like, admit it?
Okay? And nobody knows I'm here.
The day at the pickup spot, you pulled up in a minivan, a red Toyota minivan.
Same exact minivan you got parked out back.
I get that, and I apologize, seriously.
I didn't go with you that day, and I am sorry.
Look, you will never know how sorry, but I am here now.
All right? And I have cash.
You owe me for that first pickup.
Going forward, were we to, would require an additional 125.
No, no no. No, no. Stop.
I'm not gonna try to collect what you owe me.
I don't think it would end well for either one of us.
This is not an inconsequential amount of money.
Spend it wisely, it will last you for years.
Keep a low profile, travel by night.
With a little luck, you will soon find yourself many miles from here.
You are going to jack me up over a measly $1,800?
The longer you stick around here, the more you jeopardize yourself.
Have you been watching the news?
So you hear what they've been saying about me.
Look, these people, they have kept me in a concrete hole.
Look, I don't even know what month it is.
They made me watch when they...
If you believe that you can pull on people's heartstrings, you should take your chances with the police.
From where I sit, you made your own luck.
You said it yourself, a deal's a deal.
I am staying right here until you help me.
There's a young man in my store, and he refuses to leave.
But, yes, I'm beginning to feel threatened.
I own Best Quality Vacuum, Northwest. That's correct.
I would appreciate it very much if you'd send someone immediately.
You are so full of crap.
You didn't call anybody just now.
And you wanna know how I know?
You got as much to lose as I do.
When your "cops" get here and they bust me, first question they're gonna ask is what am I doing here, trying to hand over a Hefty bag full of cash to a dude who runs a vacuum cleaner store.
Oh, and you, uh, wanna know what else is bullshit?
You know, like, word to the wise: next time to try to pull this shit on someone, you don't just hang up on a 911 call.
Because the lady, or dude, or whoever is like, "Stay on the line with me, sir.
Stay on the line until the officers arrive." And if you did hang up, they'd call you back immediately.
Wow, you gotta love that response time.
Officers, thank you very much for getting here so fast.
He obviously heard my call and...
No, he's not, he's gone. I, uh...
Uh, he was spooked by my phone call and he headed up northbound, uh...
young, uh, he's white, skinny, very tall guy.
Had a tattoo over his right eyebrow.
Best Quality Vacuum, how may I help you?
A deal's a deal? Your word is your bond?
Give me... Give me the phone.
How the both of you doing?
How's Jake? Can I say hi to him?
Jake's on a band trip to London, thank God...
I heard you saying that I should turn myself in.
Yes. It's the right thing to do.
Quit running and get some help.
No one is trying to hurt you, son.
Better you come forward on your own, it'll be safer for you, better all around.
You remember where we used to have those picnics?
By the little lake, the one with all the ducks?
Do you think you guys could come get me maybe?
it's probably too late to say this...
I don't know if it'll mean much to you...
We're heading northbound on 12th, about to turn left on Lomas.
Be sure to stay on the house.
And then after that, it's the first turn off Broadway.
No, then you're gonna go ahead and look for...
Nah, man, don't go by junkyards.
Yeah. Straight down on the right.
This guy's bigger than your mom, Sean.
The car's too small for you.
That's a good start. And hello to you.
Where have you been all my life?
Oh, just waiting for you in this little car.
Oh, I'm here, baby, don't worry.
Well, nobody told me it was gonna be yucky.
I never really go for redheads.
You've been here 20 minutes, what'd you do?
Added a fishplate up here, one in the middle, one down at the end.
What, like a... plate of fish?
Is that even a real word?
Look, man, I want more of those things, the sideway diagonal things, like twice as many.
Okay, yeah. So, gussets I got out the ass, but a fishplate I need 'cause... What?
You sure you couldn't just put a few more gussets up there, Neil?
I mean, what could it hurt, right?
But what I just did, you don't even need that.
I told you I built this thing right.
Look, bro, I'm not like impugning on your precious welding skills.
It's just we have a, uh, unique situation here.
Tried to rabbit on us once already.
I'm thinking he's gonna figure out a way to break this thing.
Yeah, it's just I kinda feel it flexing a little bit. A bit right here, look.
Yeah, I don't see jack shit flexing.
That's fourinch channel iron up there.
You could hang an F150 from it and shove it back and forth like a beach ball.
Okay, you and your big four inches.
It's just this little bastard's wiry.
I don't care how wiry he is.
Wanna put your money where your mouth is?
Fifty bucks says he breaks this thing right here, right now.
Fifty, plus, then you gotta put up more of those...
Throw in some fishplates too, while you're at it.
Get that shit out the way and watch this.
This is it. This is the acid test.
Now! Go, go, go! Come on!
Hey, what are you slowing down for?
All right, come on, get up.
I got 50 bucks riding on you.
Kenny, if he breaks his leg, he's not gonna be able to cook.
What, are you the fucking HR department?
We're gonna even up the odds a little bit.
You're gonna John Henry this bitch, yeah?
Todd, who is this guy anyway?
It's... It's kind of a long story.
That's all you need to know.
You paid till three and it's five past.
Just wanna go home, get in my bed, cuddle with my dog.
I'm never coming back to this dump place again.
Look at my fucking shoes. I know.
It's gonna take me hours to get the mud out.
I said, "My son, cocaine wasn't even invented when Brigham Young was born.
It's okay, you can have some." Come on, come to papa. There we go.
âª I ain't got me nobody âª âª I don't carry me no load âª What's up?
That threeway split didn't quite cover it for me.
I'd appreciate you helping me out.
You mean there was a third more?
And you gave it to him?
When I left, he didn't even have a fucking gun.
Well, he's got one now, doesn't he?
So, you know, shut up. Let me handle this.
Neil, who the hell is this guy?
Yeah, I can't believe you just let him walk in here with...
Now, how exactly do you plan on pulling this off?
I mean, being that there's five of us and one of you.
I'm not here to rob you.
Seems to me this silly son of a bitch already forked over, big time.
Why not an even two grand?
What is that? Let me see that thing.
Oh, my God, is that a .22?
I think it was my grandfather's.
I know we got empty beer cans around here if you wanna do some plinking?
Neil, I swear to God, if you give this piece of shit one more dollar...
My third is in a duffel bag in the top drawer of that file cabinet.
Come on, man, I didn't mean this...
I'm not gonna get in another...
You tell the cops about me, and I am coming for every goddamn one of you.
How are you gonna convince me?
It's like I'm here with Sinatra.
Certainly went big with the pineapple.
Only an asshole doesn't like pineapple.
I can take it or leave it.
Actually, it's not close at all.
Get those electrolytes you were talking about.
Your sodium, you know, all that shit.
How long will it take to sell this batch?
There's no one that you can think of who might...
Uh, someone with a spare $1.3 million lying around? No.
Your family is gonna get every dime they got coming to them, Mr. White.
No matter how long it takes.
No, what is stopping you from going to college?
What would you study, you think, eh?
You could practically teach that class.
I mean, you'd be a natural.
And with a Business degree, I mean, that's handy anywhere.
Yeah, I guess that could be cool.
First step, get your GED, that's no problem.
What do I need a GED for?
Yo, you were standing right on stage when they handed it to me.
I know, it just slipped my mind.
I totally graduated high school, dick.
Which is no thanks to you, all right?
Just stay on the subject here.
I... I don't have a larger point.
You're really lucky, you know that?
You didn't have to wait your whole life to do something special.
Forty miles in that direction gets you to Haines.
Figured you could use some of that.
Kadena Air Force Base, Okinawa, Japan.
Your father's second to the last job.
Claims adjuster, Dairyland Insurance, Appleton, Wisconsin.
Daylight's burning, you know where you're going.
I'm going to Mexico City in about a month.
Anyone else you wanna say goodbye to?
Not many of us get a chance to start fresh.
I was thinking about that thing you said about the universe.
Going where the universe takes you?
I think it's a cool philosophy.
I've gone where the universe takes me my whole life.
It's better to make those decisions for yourself.
